name: OptimismPad
description: Optimismpad is The Next-Gen Launchpad for GameFi and the Metaverse NFTs & Web3 project built on Optimism. OptimismPad is the first native Decentralized Launchpad for projects building on Optimism, with a strong emphasis on providing equitable opportunities to the community without the constraints of centralized platforms or high transaction costs. OptimismPad is uniquely positioned to establish itself as the reference Launchpad on Optimism, as it not only counts former Optimism contributors in its core team but is also the Launchpad closely working with the Optimism team. As an ecosystem accelerator, OptimismPad will act as a catalyst for the next generation of projects on Optimism, helping early-stage innovative projects sail through the journey from successful fundraise to platform launch to mass adoption.
